Garment Dye (Gd) Colours:
The unique colour of our garment dye is achieved through a special process — instead of dyeing the fabric, we dye the finished garment for a dimensional, washed-down look and soft feel. Results vary from one piece to the next, so yours is truly one-of-a-kind.

Description: Best known for its intricate knits, it should come as no surprise that Story mfg. sweaters are on a whole other level. The Twinsun Rollneck is a prime example, boasting detailed hand-crocheted appliqués that bring the piece to life. On the front, you will find a telling Solar Future graphic, while the back is adorned with multicolored stripes. Like many Story mfg. pieces, the sweater is entirely hand-knit using all-organic cotton yarn that is naturally dyed.

Name: Jacquard Full-Zip Top Navy/Red/Yellow
Description: This full-zip top by Wales Bonner is defined by its all-over motif and striped detail. The garment is produced in a soft polyester fabric and features a stand collar as well as rib knit trims at the collar, cuffs, and hem.

Name: Cotton Lily-Yarn Mesh Knit Pullover Blue
Description: This standout Auralee pullover is expertly crafted using a special spinning technique where fibers are compressed and intertwined using the power of air, thus creating a unique textured yarn. The yarn is then knitted using a hand flat knitting machine to create a slow and mesh-like knit structure. Details include traditional rib knit trims at the crew neck, cuffs, and hem, as the piece is cut in an oversized fit for a more comfortable wear.

Name: Classic Zip Cardigan Pink Cast Cotton Cash
Description: Our Legacy updates the classic cardigan, delivering a must-have contemporary creation crafted from Italian yarn. The garment showcases a distinctive two-tone rib knit, while featuring a funnel collar, jersey shoulder patches, and two-way Lampo front zip fastening. It offers a relaxed, slightly elongated straight fit for a decidedly fashion-forward look.

Name: Ana Nuva Polo Black
Description: The Ana Nuva is a heavily prep-inspired polo style by Thames. It is expertly crafted from a soft merino wool blend fabric, featuring a spread collar with button closure and ribbed trims at the cuffs and hem. The label's signature crown logo is embroidered onto the chest to brand the piece, which is further embellished with engraved logo buttons.

Name: Logo Knit Sweater Black/Gray
Description: Y-3's Logo Knit Sweater is a standout piece from its latest collection. The flat-knit top is crafted from a stretchy viscose blend and is adorned with gradient graphics throughout with the brand's logo knitted at the rear.

Name: No Problemo Brushed Mohair Cardigan Black/Olive
Description: The No Problemo Cardigan arrives in celebration of Aries' new label of the same name. Crafted from a soft wool blend yarn, the cozy outerwear is adorned with a contrasting No Problemo graphic embroidered onto the front. Additional details include a V-neckline, front button fastening, and rib knit trims at the collar, cuffs, and hem.

Name: Knit Tank Top Sea Green
Description: This Marni tank top is an elevated style knit from 100% cotton, showcasing an all-over vertical stripe motif. It features a round neckline and a straight hem, with a yellow Marni logo stitched at the back of the neck.

Name: Super Hard Twist Rib Knit Boat Neck Pullover Ivory
Description: This cozy Auralee pullover is made using textured knit fabric crafted from ultra-long staple cotton spun with a three-ply fine yarn, incorporating twisted yarns and tightly knitted ribs. The boat neck style is cut in a decidedly oversized for a more comfortable and fashion-forward wear. It is available in a selection of neutral colors, capable of being dressed up or down from season to season.

Name: Classic Knitted Sweater Lotus
Description: An elevated take on the traditional crewneck sweater, this Patta classic is a heavy knit made from a cotton-polyester blend fabric, featuring a distinctive honeycomb texture. Traditional rib knit trim is implemented at the crew neck, cuffs, and hem, as the piece is subtly branded with an embroidered Script P logo at the chest. It’s worthy of note that this is a fitted silhouette, so the brand recommends sizing up for a more relaxed fit.

Name: Fringed Knitted Cardigan Moonless Night
Description: This cozy Patta cardigan is characterized by its vertical fringed stripes that draw from military ghillie suits. Knit from 100% cotton yarn, the sweater features a boxy shape and is detailed with ribbed trims. Additional details include tonal round buttons and a metal Patta branding plate implemented at the chest.

Name: Chenille Knitted Sweater Sage
Description: This cozy Patta sweater is cut for an oversized fit from 100% polyester. The garment's chenille knit construction gives it a velvety hand feel. Ribbed trims are incorporated at the crew neck, cuffs, and hem, as the piece is finished with jacquard Patta lettering across the front.

Name: Core Knit Crewneck Pullover Black
Description: The Knit Crewneck Pullover is a core Marine Serre style produced in a soft cotton fabric. Available in a classic black and white scheme, the oversized top is ribbed and defined by moon logo iconography, which is knitted on the back of the garment.

Name: Half-Zip Cardigan Beige
Description: It doesn’t get any cozier than Stone Island’s soft cotton knitwear. This particular style is an undisputed favorite, coming in a variety of neutral colorways that go with pretty much everything. Showcasing a ribbed design, the monochromatic top is subtly embellished with Stone Island’s signature logo badge at the left sleeve, and you can conveniently remove it if you prefer no branding at all. This is one elevated basic that you’ll no doubt have in heavy rotation season after season.

Name: Ribbed Soft Cotton Knit White
Description: It doesn’t get any cozier than Stone Island’s soft cotton knitwear. This particular style is an undisputed favorite, coming in a variety of neutral colorways that go with pretty much everything. Showcasing a ribbed design, the monochromatic top is subtly embellished with Stone Island’s signature logo badge at the left sleeve, and you can conveniently remove it if you prefer no branding at all. This is one elevated basic that you’ll no doubt have in heavy rotation season after season.

Name: Classic Washed Crewneck Sweater Morel
Description: Patta is responsible for delivering some of the most sought-after basics in streetwear. Styles like the Classic Crewneck arrive season after season in new and returning colorways, produced from high quality materials. This particular version of the sweater is constructed from a 490gsm brushback cotton with a garment pigment-dyed finish, featuring the brand’s trademark Script logo screenprinted at the chest.

Name: Classic Cardigan Black
Description: The Classic Cardigan mimics other Patta basics, featuring a minimal design with the brand's Script logo implemented at the chest. Crafted from 400gsm soft brushed back cotton, the sweater is cut for a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders. Ribbed trims are implemented at the collar, cuffs, and hem, as pockets then emerge on the front of the silhouette.

Name: Unity Sweater Vest Lime/Beige
Description: The Unity Sweater Vest is a vibrant Wales Bonner style that will instantly inject color into your wardrobe. Crafted from recycled polyester, the garment is detailed with ribbed trims at the neckline, cuffs, and hem, all while being cut for a slightly oversized fit that caters to layering.

Name: Michel Exaggerated Rib Organic Cotton Hooded Cardigan Midnight Blue
Description: The Michel is a chunky cardigan style rib knit from 100% Italian organic cotton with a very soft hand. Cut for a relaxed fit, it features saddle shoulder construction where the ribs define the shape, with a generous hood and front button closure. Additional details include side hand pockets and an intricate intarsia monogram. In order to protect the color and the garment itself, professional dry cleaning is recommended.

Name: Jack Crew Neck Cashmere Short-Sleeve Sweater  Midnight Blue
Description: This version of Meta Campania Collective's Jack Sweater ditches the long sleeves to make it a viable warm weather option. It is tightly knit from Italian cashmere with a very soft hand and features saddle shoulder construction. Designed for a loose fit, the sweater is detailed with an exaggerated ribbed crew neck, cuffs, and hem, all while being subtly branded with intarsia monogram on the sleeve.

Name: Becks Knit Sweater Multi
Description: Known for its intricate tops that blend various aspects of pop culture, KNITWRTH has grown to be a go-to brand for big names like Peggy Gou, Emily Ratajkwoski, Nia Archives, and more. This knit sweater is adorned with an all-over graphic resembling the footballing legend David Beckham and features a candid portrait of him and his wife, Victoria Beckham, on the back.

Name: Landscape Sweater Vest Multi
Description: An ode to the scenic pastures of Bolton Abbey, this knit sweater vest is embellished with an all-over graphic that draws reference from mid-century paintings. Crafted from a wool and alpaca blend fabric, the limited-edition top is detailed with a v-neck collar and thick ribbed trims.

Name: Knit Raffia Shirt Rafia
Description: This standout summer style by Bonsai is knit from 100% polyester and defined by a semi see-through look. Cut for a relaxed, boxy fit, the garment features a spread collar, front button fastening, short sleeves, and a straight hem.

Name: Shrunken Fullzip Polo Black Rib
Description: This version of Our Legacy's Shrunken Fullzip Polo is executed in a rib knit Portuguese jersey fabric. It features a funnel neck collar, long sleeves, and straight hem, with two-way front zip fastening that allows for various styling options. The piece offers a short, boxy fit that ensures a more standout look.

Name: Harry Polo Purple
Description: Half polo half sweater, the Harry is crafted from a soft mohair and merino wool blend fabric. The garment is defined by a vibrant pastel stroke design and detailed with a spread collar and half button closure. It is cut for a relaxed fit to ensure a more comfortable wear.

Name: Sigmar Jersey Cotton Short-Sleeve Crew Neck Dark Chocolate Brown
Description: The Sigmar is a short-sleeve crew neck style by Meta Campania Collective. Arriving for the season in a neutral brown colorway, the monochromatic garment is constructed from 100% cotton and detailed with rib knit trims at the neckline and hem.

Name: Joseph Jersey Cotton Crew Neck Black
Description: An elevated crew neck style, the Joseph is constructed from a midweight Italian cotton jersey fabric, arriving for the season in a versatile black colorway. It features rib knit trims and slightly dropped shoulders, all while being cut for a loose fit. A tonal stitched monogram is implemented at the left side seam to subtly brand the piece.

Name: Sweater CN Longsleeve
Description: Order your regular size.

Name: Spread Collar Knit Shirt Dove Gray
Description: This stylish Stone Island knit is defined by a spread collar that gives the piece a distinctive overall look. It is constructed from a cotton and nylon blend fabric and features rib knit trims. The label's signature removable logo badge is applied to the left sleeve to definitively brand the style.

Name: Half-Zip Sweater Natural Beige
Description: This cozy Stone Island Half-Zip is knit in a soft cotton-linen blend fabric. It is outfitted with a valet-stand collar, half-zip neck closure, ribbed trims, and a single chest pocket. To minimally brand the silhouette, a removable Stone Island logo badge is incorporated onto the left sleeve.

Name: Zip Cardigan Dove Grey
Description: Stone Island's Zip Cardigan is an essential layering piece designed for year-round wear. Crafted from a soft cotton-linen blend material, the garment features ribbed trims at the stand collar, cuffs, and hem, all while boasting two-way front zip fastening that allows for various styling options. SI's signature removable logo badge is applied to the left sleeve to definitively brand the style.

Name: Zip Cardigan Musk
Description: Stone Island's Zip Cardigan is an essential layering piece designed for year-round wear. Crafted from a soft cotton material, the garment features ribbed trims at the stand collar, cuffs, and hem, all while boasting two-way front zip fastening that allows for various styling options. SI's signature removable logo badge is applied to the left sleeve to definitively brand the style.

Name: Logo Badge Knit Sweater Pink
Description: Arriving in an inviting pink colorway, this Stone Island sweater is expertly knit from a cotton-nylon blend fabric that has a unique appearance. The garment is detailed with ribbed trims at the crew neck and cuffs, all while being minimally branded with the label's signature removable logo badge, which emerges on the left sleeve.

Name: Poly Knit Sweater Vest Ruby Red
Description: This knit tank top is made from densely woven polyester with a smooth texture. Detailed with a classic scoop neckline, the loose and oversized tank top features a subtle HS05 flag label along the side seam.

Name: Pigment Dyed Sweater Washed Black
Description: This Sweater has a vintage-looking, uneven finish that's made from a pigment dye and wash. Constructed entirely from cotton with a ribbed knit texture, the top is cut in a boxy fit and features dropped shoulders with a crewneck collar.

Name: Pigment Dyed Sweater Light Blue
Description: This Sweater has a vintage-looking, uneven finish which is made from a pigment dye and wash. Constructed entirely from cotton with a ribbed knit texture, the top is cut in a boxy fit and features dropped shoulders with a crewneck collar.

Name: Poly Knit Sweater Vest Black
Description: This knit tank top is made from densely woven polyester with a smooth texture. Detailed with a classic scoop neckline, the loose and oversized tank top features a subtle HS05 flag label along the side seam.

Name: Poly Knit Cardigan Black
Description: The Poly Knit Cardigan is cut in a boxy fit with ribbing along the cuffs, trim, and hem. The long-sleeve sweater is finished with a smoked mother-of-pearl button closure and two front pockets.

Name: Loose Gauge Tank Top Black
Description: This tank top features a loose gauge knit with a subtle translucent appearance. Made from an alpaca and wool blend detailed with ribbed trims, the oversized tank features a subtle woven HS05 flag along the side seam.

Name: Loose Gauge Tank Top Blue
Description: This tank top features a loose gauge knit with a subtle translucent appearance. Made from an alpaca and wool blend detailed with ribbed trims, the oversized tank features a subtle woven HS05 flag along the side seam.

Name: Poly Knit Sweater Vest Blue
Description: This knit tank top is made from densely woven polyester with a smooth texture. Detailed with a classic scoop neckline, the loose and oversized tank top features a subtle HS05 flag label along the side seam.

Name: Loose Gauge Tank Top Red
Description: This tank top features a loose gauge knit with a subtle translucent appearance. Made from an alpaca and wool blend detailed with ribbed trims, the oversized tank features a subtle woven HS05 flag along the side seam.

Name: Oversize Knit Polo Glazed Ginger
Description: The Oversize Polo by Bonsai is defined by an intricate knit pattern implemented in all-over fashion. Constructed from a viscose and polyamide blend, the garment arrives in a neutral colorway that makes way for effortless matching. It is semi see-through and detailed with single button fastening and rib knit trims. The silhouette’s slightly oversized, boxy cut ensures a timeless wear.

Name: Mock Neck Jumper Pecan Brown
Description: An elevated mock neck style, this Lemaire jumper is produced in a soft wool-acrylic blend. It arrives in a neutral brown colorway for multi-seasonal wear, detailed with rib knit trims at the neckline, cuffs, and hem. You can easily dress this one up or down all year long.

Name: Relaxed Twisted Cardigan Dark Navy
Description: A Lemaire staple, this relaxed-fitting cardigan is based on the label's Twisted family, featuring asymmetric button placket that closes on the side seam and wraps around the waist. It is made from a merino blend with a dry hand and a slightly heathered appearance. Additional details include inside-out seams and rib knit trims at the neckline, cuffs, and hem.

Name: Sweatshirt Hoodie Greyhound Heatmap Print Cotton Fleece Medium Weight
Description: Order your regular size.

Name: Crochet Vest Black
Description: This Martine Rose top is knit from 100% cotton and defined by intricate crocheted detailing at the neckline and armholes. It arrives in a stealthy all-black scheme for effortless matching from season to season, as you can wear the garment on its own or paired with complementary outerwear.

Name: Acid Wash Jumper Olive Green
Description: As the name suggests, this Acne Studios jumper is defined by its irregular acid wash finish. It arrives in an enticing olive green colorway, crafted from 100% cotton. Details include traditional rib knit finishes at the crew neck, cuffs, and hem, with logo embroidery implemented on the upper back of the garment.

Name: S-Ginn-Hood-D Black
Description: The S-Ginn-Hood-D is a staple hoodie style by Diesel, one that showcases the brand's signature "D" logo front and center. Offered in a versatile black color option, the cozy pullover is predominantly crafted from cotton and features traditional design elements that include a drawstring hood, rib knit trims, and a front pouch pocket. The hoodie is unisex and cut for a loose fit.

Name: Papillon Mohair Cardigan Olive
Description: Ideal for layering throughout the year, this Needles cardigan is made in Japan from a hairy mohair and wool blend. The sweater is detailed with the brand's papillon logo throughout which features ribbed trims at the collar, cuffs, and hem that is finished with a tonal button closure.

Name: Argyle Mohair Cardigan Purple
Description: Ideal for layering throughout the year, this Needles cardigan is made in Japan from a cozy mohair and wool blend. The sweater is detailed with a purple argyle pattern which features ribbed trims at the collar, cuffs, and hem that is finished with a tonal button closure.

Name: La Maille Seville Beige
Description: La Maille Seville is knit from large ribbed wool in a relaxed fit. The cozy style is outfitted with double-sided zip fastening with engraved round and square tips, while being detailed with ribbed cuffs and hem. Pockets are incorporated onto the sides of the silhouette, which is embellished with a ribbed "J" embroidered onto the arm.

Name: Wool Knit Polo Light Brown
Description: This cozy ROA sweater is expertly knit using fine wool to ensure superior warmth and comfort, as the natural wicking abilities of wool fibers help create a feeling of freshness no matter the weather. It is detailed with traditional ribbed trims at the collar, cuffs, and hem, while being subtly branded with a contrasting ROA logo, which is knit onto the front of the garment.

Name: Twinsun Cardigan Olive Toms
Description: STORY mfg.’s Twinsun Cardigan is unlike any other. As with many garments from the brand, the sweater is knit entirely by hand using all-organic cotton yarn that is naturally dyed. It is outfitted with corozo nut buttons and brought to life with intricate, hand crochet applique details on the front as well as the back. Cut in a classic grandad cardigan shape, the hand-knit garment will grow with wear.

Name: Cotton V-Neck Vest Steel
Description: This Marni sweater vest is a distressed style knit from 100% cotton. It is defined by distressed detailing, while featuring traditional rib knit trims at the neckline, cuffs, and hem. To further embellish the piece, a hand-stitched Marni logo is incorporated at the neck in contrasting thread.

Name: Le Pull Jacquemus Light Beige
Description: Le Pull Jacquemus is a super cozy sweater style, arriving for the season in an inviting light beige colorway. Cut for a relaxed fit with elongated sleeves, the garment is crafted from a brushed alpaca knit that is noticeably soft to the touch. It features rounded shoulders and ribbed trims at the crew neck and cuffs. A contrasting jacquard logo is applied to the back to definitively brand the piece.

Name: Eternal Zip Washed Black
Description: Entire Studios' Eternal Zip is defined by the metal front zipper that extends to the top of the hood. The boxy garment is crafted from organic cotton brushed back fleece, featuring a heavy enzyme wash that can cause slight variances in appearance. Rib knit trims are incorporated at the cuffs and hem, as the cozy style is then finished with pockets at the front of the silhouette.

Name: Eternal Zip Brunette
Description: Entire Studios' Eternal Zip is defined by the metal front zipper that extends to the top of the hood. The boxy garment is crafted from organic cotton brushed back fleece, featuring a heavy enzyme wash that can cause slight variances in appearance. Rib knit trims are incorporated at the cuffs and hem, as the cozy style is then finished with pockets at the front of the silhouette.

Name: Extreme Pile Pullover Gardenia White/Sulphur Moss
Description: A cold weather essential, the Extreme Pile Pullover is characterized by its warmth and softness. It features a relaxed fit, outfitted with an exposed half zip, secure zip chest pocket, and reverse coil zip hand pockets. The style is finished with an embroidered The North Face logo at the chest.

Name: Jacquard Crew Neck Jumper Faded Pink Melange/Light Blue
Description: This standout Acne Studios jumper draws immediate attention with an all-over seasonal jacquard Face logo animation. It arrives in a playful pink and blue colorway, crafted from a soft lambswool and cotton blend fabric. Rib knit trims are implemented at the crew neck, cuffs, and hem, as the unisex style is then finished with the label's micro Face logo patch at the hem.

Name: Striped Alpaca Wool Sweater Brown/Blue
Description: This seasonal sweater by Jil Sander is characterized by its hairy, brushed texture that's made from an alpaca and wool blend. Detailed in a brown hue with contrasting blue stripes on the elongated sleeves, the sweater is finished with a ribbed crewneck collar, cuffs, and hem.

Name: Wool Gilet  Medium Brown
Description: This Maison Margiela Gilet arrives for the season in an inviting Medium Brown colorway, crafted from a midweight wool and alpaca blend fabric. It features a V neckline and a straight hem, while being cut for a classic boxy fit. You can wear the Wool Gilet from season to season, pairing it with short- and long-sleeve tops or sporting it on its own for a more standout look.

Name: Crewneck Cardigan Mandarin Orange Melange
Description: The Crewneck Cardigan is a unisex Acne Studios style cut for a fitted fit. It is made from a soft and lightweight wool fabric, while featuring rib knit trims at the collar, cuffs, and hem. Buttons line down the center front of the garment, which is minimally branded with a small Face logo patch at the chest.

Name: French Merino Rib Knit Cardigan Light Khaki
Description: Minimally designed with high-quality materials, this Auralee Cardigan is detailed with an all-over ribbed texture. The lightweight sweater is crafted entirely from French merino wool and features dropped shoulders with a v-neck collar and button closure.

Name: Washed French Merino Knit Crewneck Brown
Description: This Auralee pullover is made from soft French merino wool that's detailed with a unique, stonewashed texture. Cut in a relaxed fit with a seasonal brown colorway, the lightweight sweater is finished with a ribbed collar, cuffs, and hem.

Name: Reversible Blouson Shade Green
Description: This reversible jacket is predominantly made from a lightweight recycled polyester fabric that is considerably stretchy and water-repellent. The garment is detailed with contrasting stitching throughout, while featuring a crew neck and front zip fastening. The hem is elasticated and fit with an adjustable drawcord that allows you to make minor alterations to styling.

Name: Knit Zip-Up Cardigan Black
Description: This comfy Margiela cardigan is knit from a soft cotton and wool bend fabric. It is cut for a relaxed fit and features a standing collar as well as two-way front zip closure that allows for various styling options. The fashion house's iconic four stitches moniker is applied to the back of the garment to subtly brand the piece.

Name: Regenerated Lozenge Knit Crewneck Pullover Multi
Description: This unique Marine Serre garment is crafted from upcycled jumpers and flocked sheer jersey. The gleaming sheer inserts allow you to make a bold statement with this particular piece, which is adorned with all-over diamond-shaped motifs. The pullover is made from a combination of cotton and wool fabrics, and detailed with traditional rib knit trims at the crew neck, cuffs, and hem.

Name: Wool and Fluffy Knit Crewneck Pullover Beige
Description: This cozy Marine Serre crewneck is defined by a fluffy signature moon logo implemented on the back of the garment. Crafted from a soft wool fabric, the oversized pullover is rib knit and features a traditional crew neck with long sleeves.

Name: Alpaca Fuzzy Sweater Vest Green
Description: The Alpaca Sweater Vest is made using a fuzzy wool and alpaca blend in a bright green colorway. Contrasting printed floral graphics designed by artist George Addy embellish the sleeveless design that’s finished with a v-neck collar and a co-branded woven patch.

Name: Wool Cardigan Poppy
Description: This Jil Sander cardigan is made from merino wool that's been pre-shrunk to ensure effortless wear. The sweater is cut in a relaxed, boxy fit that's detailed with a v-neck collar and dropped shoulders. Ribbed cuffs, neck, and hem add the finishing touches to this long-sleeved top along with a front button closure.

Name: Knitted V-Neck Sweater Flou Pink
Description: Arriving in a bright pink scheme, this Stockholm Surfboard Club sweater is designed to inject color into your wardrobe. It is knit from a soft merino wool and acrylic blend fabric and features contrasting trim. Rib knit details emerge at the V-neckline, cuffs, and hem to finish the cropped, unisex garment.

Name: Compact Roundneck Mole Grey Super Wool
Description: Our Legacy's Compact Roundneck is rib knit from a soft merino wool Italian yarn. It is cut for a slim fit, arriving in a neutral grey colorway for effortless matching. Details include a bound collar and overlocked cuffs and hem.

Name: Logo Turtleneck Pumpkin
Description: Jil Sander's Logo Turtleneck arrives for the cold weather season in a vibrant Pumpkin colorway. Constructed from a lightweight, technical wool jersey material, the long-sleeve top is cut for a slim fit to ensure a more fashion-forward look. A contrasting Jil Sander logo is applied to the turtleneck to subtly brand the garment.

Name: Checked Mohair Cardigan Black
Description: Marni utilizes mohair as good as anyone. For the new season, the brand comes through with a super soft mohair cardigan that showcases a brushed checked pattern. The cozy garment features a V neckline and front button closure, while being cut in a relaxed fit that allows for layering.

Name: Wool Blend Cardigan Mineral Blue
Description: This Acne Studios cardigan arrives for the season in an inviting mineral blue colorway that will add a splash of color to your outfits. It is made from a rich wool and cotton blend fabric that has a soft, slightly textured hand feel. Details include a V-neckline and rib knit trims at the cuffs and hem.

Name: Denim Trompe L'oeil Long-Sleeve Navy/Blue
Description: Jean Paul Gaultier's latest Tattoo Collection is filled with archival silhouettes like this enchanting Denim Trompe L'oeil Long-Sleeve. Detailed with an all-over denim jacket print, the stretchy long sleeve features navy blue inserts at the shoulders, cuffs, hem, and turtleneck collar that further embellish this one-of-a-kind top.

Name: Pull Ange Brown
Description: A standout piece from A.P.C. and JW Anderson's latest collection, the Pull Ange is characterized by its reversible design and multiple textures. The crewneck style features an outer shell that's crafted entirely from knit wool in a calm, dark brown hue while the reversible side is detailed with loose gauge cashmere-wool yarn that wraps around the garment in an asymmetrical design. Thick, woven clusters and patterns can be found throughout the pullover on the reverse side along the chest and at the ribbed collar, as the top also leaves room for contrast at the ribbed cuffs, hem, and seams.

Name: Degrade Knit Crewneck Sweater Sunset
Description: This Bonsai crewneck is defined by an eye-catching gradient effect, as the piece arrives in a vibrant orange and blue colorway. It is crafted from nylon and offers a comfortable, oversized fit. Rib knit trims are implemented at the crew neck, cuffs, and hem to complete the design.

Name: Oversized Knit Cardigan Ice
Description: As comfy as it gets, this super soft Bonsai cardigan is knit from a premium wool and polyamide blend fabric. It showcases a captivating all-over motif and is detailed with rib knit trims at the neckline, cuffs, and hem. The sweater is cut for an oversized fit to allow for layering during the cooler months of the year.

Name: Wool Blend Inlaid Knit Crew Black
Description: This crewneck sweater is detailed with a plush texture and arrives in neutral hues. The cozy top is made of an acrylic-wool blend fabric and is cut in a boxy fit with a self-fabric collar, open cuffs, and hem.

Name: Recycled Half-Zip Wool Fleece Black
Description: Crafted from recycled wool blend fabric, the Half-Zip Wool Fleece is characterized by its waffle texture and monochrome palette. The fleece jacket features a quarter zip closure at the chest along with a patch pocket and stand collar.

Name: Wool Blend Inlaid Knit Crew Brown
Description: This crewneck sweater is detailed with a plush texture and arrives in neutral hues. The cozy top is made of an acrylic-wool blend fabric and is cut in a boxy fit with a self-fabric collar, open cuffs, and hem.

Name: Cashmere Crew Sweater Beige
Description: The Cashmere Crew Sweater arrives cut in a relaxed fit, crafted entirely from lightweight cashmere that’s milled in Scotland. The long-sleeve top is finished through contrasting hues at the crewneck collar along with a ribbed hem and cuffs.

Name: Recycled Half-Zip Wool Fleece Brown
Description: Crafted from recycled wool blend fabric, the Half-Zip Wool Fleece is characterized by its waffle texture and monochrome palette. The fleece jacket features a quarter zip closure at the chest along with a patch pocket and stand collar.

Name: Liquid Alpaca Vest Light Grey
Description: This sweater vest by J.L-A.L is defined by a distinctive "liquid" design. It is knit from a fuzzy, lightweight alpaca and synthetic yarn, while featuring ribbed trims at the high neck collar and arm openings.

Name: Quarter-Zip Knit Jumper Praline
Description: J.W. Anderson reimagines a classic silhouette for its latest seasonal collection. Crafted from a soft and supple merino wool, the midweight jumper features a high neck with quarter-zip closure and the brand’s signature oversized pull tab.

Name: Ongoye Knit Cardigan Red
Description: The Ongoye Cardigan is one of the standout pieces from Ahluwalia’s latest collection that blends the designer’s heritage with their London roots. Crafted from a soft mohair blend fabric, the sweater is defined by its striking abstract patterns and brushed texture.

Name: Kingpin Knitted Vest Brown
Description: The Kingpin Vest is knit from a soft viscose-organic cotton blend fabric. It features an all-over diamond print, with an "A" patchwork motif at the chest. Additional design details include a V neckline, straight hem, and rib knit trims.

Name: High Neck Longsleeve Printed Wood Top Brown/Ecru
Description: This lightweight Jean Paul Gaultier top is produced in a stretchy nylon material with a washed appearance. Showcasing an all-over "scratch wood" motif, the longsleeve garment features a high neck and a straight hem. It is cut for a fitted, cropped wear.

Name: High Neck Longsleeve Printed Stripe Top Ecru/Brown
Description: This lightweight Jean Paul Gaultier top is produced in a stretchy nylon material with a washed appearance. Showcasing a horizontal stripe motif, the longsleeve garment features a high neck and a straight hem. It is cut for a fitted, cropped wear.

Name: Funichan Sweater Black Rustic Merino
Description: This season, Our Legacy's Funichan Sweater arrives in a black look, crafted from an Italian merino yarn. The ribbed knit gives the garment a straight and somewhat longer fit that ensures a more comfortable and fashion-forward wear. Details include a funnel neck collar, lampo two-way zip, and a straight hem.

Name: Kaito Cardigan Brown Mohair
Description: The Kaito is a relaxed-fitting sweater style by Séfr, one that arrives this season in a neutral brown colorway. Crafted from a soft mohair blend fabric, the garment features traditional design elements in a V-neckline, front button closure, and ribbed trims. Two pockets are incorporated onto the front of the silhouette to complete the design.

Name: Knit Crewneck Brown
Description: De La Soul has established itself as hip-hop royalty since its debut album was released in 1989, garnering worldwide recognition. To celebrate the group’s success in tandem with hip-hop’s 50th anniversary, this collaborative knit sweater arrives bearing De La Soul’s iconic peace sign across the chest detailed in a jacquard knit. The sweater is finished with ribbed trims, crewneck, and hem along with a co-branded woven label at the chest.

Name: Oversized V-Neck Jumper Indigo
Description: This Martine Rose jumper is knit from midweight lambswool and cut for a loose fit. It is detailed with ribbed trims at the V-neckline and cuffs, while being minimally branded with a contrasting logo patch that is incorporated onto the front of the silhouette at the hem.

Name: Boiled Cable Vest Brown
Description: A high fashion take on the classic cable knit, this Martine Rose style is made from an extra fine merino wool that is boiled to create stiffness and structure. It features capped sleeves and ribbed edges, with a seasonal Martine Rose branded tab stitched at the hem.

Name: Bokasafn Pullover Walnut
Description: The Bokasafn is a comfy pullover style knit from a soft wool blend fabric. Cut for a relaxed fit, the garment features a high neck with half-zip closure; ribbed trims at the collar, cuffs, and hem; and front zip pockets. Intricate embroidery is incorporated onto the back of the piece to define the silhouette.

Name: Wool Cardigan Multi
Description: Missoni’s pattern expertise is on full display with this new cardigan from its latest seasonal collection. Explosive colors come together in a horizontal stripe pattern to deliver a captivating outerwear design. Made from a wool-alpaca-mohair blend, the sweater is detailed with ribbed trims and features front hand pockets.

Name: Wool V-Neck Sweater Navy
Description: This Maison Margiela v-neck sweater draws attention with an eye-catching splatter effect. Made from 100% wool, the loose-fitting garment is detailed with ribbed trims and subtly branded with the fashion house's iconic four stitches moniker on the back of the neck.

Name: K-Patmos Knit Sweater Blue
Description: This distinctive Diesel sweater style showcases a jacquard trompe l'oeil motif inspired by jeans jackets, thus creating the illusion of buttons, patch pockets, and a back yoke. The comfy top is made from a blend of mohair, wool, and technical yarns, featuring traditional rib knit trims at the crew neck, cuffs, and hem. It features a loose fit that runs large, so simply size down if you're looking for a more regular fit.

Name: Wool V-Neck Sweater Dark Mustard
Description: This cozy Lemaire sweater is produced in a soft, medium-weight lambswool with a jersey stitch. Cut for a relaxed fit, the knit garment features dropped shoulders and rib knit trims at the V-neckline, cuffs, and hem.

Name: Alpaca Fuzzy Wave Sweater Vest Pale Rose/Red
Description: This textured vest is crafted from fuzzy alpaca-blend fabric in a wavy striped pattern. Produced from superfine alpaca yarn, the vest is detailed with a soft, brushed finish and features a round neckline with ribbed trims. The knit vest is cut with a relaxed fit and made in Peru.

Name: Alpaca Fuzzy Wave Sweater Vest Light Blue/Brown
Description: This textured vest is crafted from fuzzy alpaca-blend fabric in a wavy striped pattern. Produced from superfine alpaca yarn, the vest is detailed with a soft, brushed finish and features a round neckline with ribbed trims. The knit vest is cut with a relaxed fit and made in Peru.

Name: Alpaca Gradient Sweater Vest
Description: The Highsnobiety Sweater Vest is constructed from a soft and lightweight alpaca-wool blend that caters to spring and summer wear. Cut in a standard, boxy fit, the piece is detailed with traditional design elements including ribbed trims at the V-neckline, cuffs, and hem.

Name: Alpaca Fuzzy Wave Sweater Vest Navy/Olive green
Description: This textured vest is crafted from fuzzy alpaca-blend fabric in a wavy striped pattern. Produced from superfine alpaca yarn, the vest is detailed with a soft, brushed finish and features a round neckline with ribbed trims. The knit vest is cut with a relaxed fit and made in Peru.

Name: Gatekeeper Sweater Black
Description: The Gatekeeper is a full fashion knit sweater made from a plush mohair blend. The style features traditional rib knit trims at the crew neck, cuffs, and hem, while being defined by an intarsia knit skull logo applied front and center.

Name: New Order Power, Corruption & Lies Crewneck Black
Description: Medicom pays homage to English rock band New Order with the release of this limited edition crewneck. Made from a wool-acrylic blend fabric, the garment is embellished with a multicolored graphic depicting the album cover for New Order’s 1983 project, Power, Corruption & Lies, in addition to complementary band iconography. Additional details include rib knit trims at the crew neck, cuffs, and hem.

Name: Moon Diamant Knit Jacquard Sleeveless Pullover Red
Description: The Moon Diamant Knit is defined by a distinctive jacquard pattern on the front of the garment, while the back boasts a complementary colorblock design. Crafted from a wool-blend fabric, the sleeveless pullover features a fitted cut, detailed with a mini turtle neck with zip fastening, as well as rib knit trims at the collar, armholes, and hem.

Name: K-Elasa Turtleneck Blue
Description: The K-Elasa by Diesel is a slim-fitting turtleneck made from indigo-dyed cotton. The garment is stonewashed to create a faded color effect, with destroyed elements at the hem and cuffs. A red logo tag is incorporated at the hem to complete the look and subtly brand the design.

Name: Melbourne Knit Brown
Description: The Melbourne Knit is a cozy Dries van Noten sweater style produced in a soft alpaca-blend fabric. It arrives this season in a neutral brown color that caters to repeat wear, featuring traditional rib knit trims at the crew neck, cuffs, and hem.

Name: Morgan Knit Brown
Description: The Morgan Knit is a seasonal Dries van Noten sweater style, arriving in a neutral brown colorway for effortless matching. It is produced in a soft alpaca-blend fabric and detailed with traditional rib knit trims at the crew neck, cuffs, and hem.

Name: Melbourne Knit Yellow
Description: The Melbourne Knit is a cozy Dries van Noten sweater style produced in a soft alpaca-blend fabric. It arrives this season in a bright yellow shade for injecting color into your cold weather outfits, featuring traditional rib knit trims at the crew neck, cuffs, and hem.

Name: Meron Knit Black
Description: The Meron Knit is a cropped sweater style made from a soft wool-cashmere blend fabric. It arrives this season in a neutral black colorway that makes way for repeat wear, featuring a deep V-neckline and rib knit trims at the cuffs and hem.

Name: Brushed Wool Cardigan Blue
Description: Acne Studios’ Wool Cardigan is produced in a super-soft mohair and wool blend with a brushed texture that simply begs to be touched. The playful style is brought to life with an irregular, spotted pattern implemented in all-over fashion, one that is sure to catch the attention of passersby. Cut in a relaxed fit, the cozy cardigan is outfitted with contrasting buttons and two front pockets.

Name: Mohair Cardigan Brown
Description: A good cardigan is a versatile layering piece suitable for all seasons. From Acne Studios’ latest collection, this particular style is produced in a brushed mohair and wool blend that ensures a cozy wear time and time again. It is detailed with a fuzzy exterior, ribbed v-neck, cuffs, and hem and features two pockets at the front. You can pair it with denim and a T-shirt for more casual outings or slacks and a button-down when you need a dressier look. Either way, this will do the trick.

Name: Wool V-Neck Sweater Brown
Description: Made for everyone, the Wool V-Neck Sweater from Acne Studios is a versatile unisex style cut in a relaxed fit for an extra cozy wear. It is crafted from a super-soft wool and cashmere blend, featuring a rib knit V-neckline, cuffs, and hem, delivering a contemporary update to a classic garment.

Name: Wool Turtleneck Pink
Description: Liven up your wardrobe with this captivating turtleneck from Marni's latest collection. Knit from an alpaca and virgin wool blend, the turtleneck is designed for an oversized fit with dropped shoulders to make way for layering. With a lush pink hue and distressed edges throughout the sweater,  the turtleneck is finished with a patch pocket and a hand-embroidered logo along the chest.

Name: Distressed Wool Crewneck Sweater Multi
Description: This season, Maison Margiela comes through with a distinctive new take on the classic crewneck sweater. The garment is produced in soft wool-alpaca blend fabric and features argyle intarsia knit with contrasting stitches. Ribbed trims are implemented at the crew neck, cuffs, and hem to complete the design.

Name: Distressed Wool Sweater Vest Multi
Description: This season, Maison Margiela comes through with a distinctive new take on the classic sweater vest. The garment is produced in soft wool-alpaca blend fabric and features argyle intarsia knit with contrasting stitches. Ribbed trims are implemented at the V-neck, cuffs, and hem to complete the design.

Name: face Tiles Cardigan Toffee Brown
Description: Cardigans don’t have to be boring and this Acne Studios style is anything but. The knitted design’s decorated with a playful motif in all-over fashion. Arriving in a two-tone brown colorway, the wool-cotton blend sweater is made with front button closure and features a ribbed V-neckline, cuffs, and hem. It is a unisex offering that is cut for a regular fit.

Name: Mistur Sweater Vest Beige
Description: The sweater vest is back and this season, RANRA comes through with a new style that features contrasting rib knit trims at the collar, armholes, and hem. Crafted from 100% cotton, the sleeveless garment features a V-neck and a standard boxy fit to ensure a timeless wear.

Name: Meddo Knit Sweater Vest Ecru
Description: This season, Dries van Noten’s Meddo Knit arrives in a tonal off-white colorway that caters to effortless matching. Detailed with crotched-knit stars throughout, the sleeveless top features a contrasting hem, round neckline, and is crafted from a cozy wool and cashmere blend that’s soft to the touch.

Name: Knitted Vest Cartoon Static Stripe
Description: The sweater vest is back in a major way. To fill the void in your closet, Our Legacy comes through with this knitted design made from 100% polyester. Emerging in a light purple colorway with an all-over stripe motif, it features a V-neck collar, ribbed trims, and a straight hem.

Name: Not in Paris 5 Knitted Sweater
Description: Inspired by classic collegiate styles, this sweater celebrates one of the main fashion capitals through its knitted chest graphic. Elsewhere, the right sleeve of this boxy-fitting sweater features embroidered branding. This is one of many pieces specifically designed to commemorate the fifth edition of Not In Paris, a multi-media event hosted by Highsnobiety featuring a selection of our favorite brands, artists, musicians, and other creators leading the charge in pushing culture forward. Coinciding with men’s fashion month, Not In Paris 5 hones in on the defining aspects of Paris, its people, and institutions, with collaborative capsules and inline releases spanning cut and sew, graphic styles, accessories, and collectibles.

Name: Utility Crewneck Sweater Black
Description: Yohji Yamamoto has used his Y-3 sub-line, made together with adidas, as his playground for finding the sweet spot between fashion and sportswear for over 20 years. On this casual sweater, the collaborative line utilizes a relaxed, slightly boxy fit and a soft wool blend for optimum comfort. A color that Yamamoto is famous for championing, this piece arrives in all-black for effortless matching.

Name: Kid Mohair Sheer Knit Light Blue
Description: This knit sweater from Auralee brings a fun semi-sheer look to your wardrobe. Cut for a relaxed fit, the lightweight garment is made using ultra-fine South African kid mohair tamu yarn, as the fibers have a smooth texture without the itchy characteristics typically associated with mohair. The sweater features rib knit trims at the neckline, cuffs, and hem.

Name: Intact Vest Raw White Chunky Cotton Rib
Description: The Intact Vest is a distinctive Our Legacy style cut in a slim, cropped fit that caters to adventurous layering. Produced in a chunky ribbed cotton knit, the sleeveless garment will shape to the wearer and naturally distress over time. It is detailed with a ribbed V-neck collar, offered in a neutral white colorway for effortless matching from season to season.

Name: Colour Theory Cardigan Multi
Description: Unlike most cardigans, this AGR style is made without a button closure, instead opting for an open front. It is constructed from a soft cotton fabric, showcasing an eye-catching gradient print design that is rich in color. The sweater is cut in an oversized fit with dropped shoulders and finished with ribbed trims.

Name: Spray Dyed Sweat Multi
Description: Bonsai’s latest seasonal collection includes an assortment of spray dyed pieces that showcase a distinctive all-over pattern. Primed and ready to bring vibrant energy to your daily looks, garments like the Spray Dyed Sweat see its knitted construction decorated with a bold colorway. The cotton top is cut for a slightly boxy fit to ensure a comfortable wear.

Name: Knit Zip-Up Cardigan Brown
Description: Maison Margiela ditches the buttons and opts for a zipper on this luxe cardigan. Offered in a versatile brown colorway, the cozy sweater is produced in a soft wool and cotton blend, featuring a high neck and the house’s iconic four stitches moniker at the back. Two-way zip fastening allows you to adjust the look and fit of the cardigan, so you can easily switch things up each time you wear it.

Name: Keeping Vest Treefall
Description: One of the standouts from Story mfg.’s latest seasonal collection arrives by way of the Keeping Vest. The colorful sweater is entirely hand knitted using organic cotton which has been naturally dyed. Made to be loose and drapey, the Keeping Vest will grow with wear due to the hand knitting.

Name: Striped V-Neck Sweater Vest Blue
Description: This new Marni piece is a playful take on the classic sweater vest. Produced in a soft mohair and nylon blend, the V-neck sweater has a fuzzy texture and showcases an eye-catching stripe print implemented throughout. It is cut in a relaxed fit for a more comfortable wear and detailed with ribbed trims.

Name: Mae Sweatervest
Description: Since launching in 2018, Ahluwalia has become well-known for crafting unique patchworked garments that blend the designer’s heritage with vintage and various textiles. The Mae Sweater Vest is an elevated take on a traditional fleece vest and arrives with a deep v-neck neckline, along with contrasting wavy panels and piping that have become one of the brand’s signature designs.

Name: Classic Double Neck Oversized Sweater Brown
Description: This standout Y/Project style is the brand’s elevated reimagining of a traditional turtleneck sweater. Constructed from a plush wool blend, the garment is characterized by a double collar opening that is accented with contrasting stripes. The sweater is cut in an oversized fit for a more stylish look and comfortable wear, featuring dropped shoulders and ribbed trims to complete the design.

Name: ‘BOKE FLOWER’ Jumper
Description: A motif that has been central to artistic director Nigo’s collections for KENZO, the BOKE FLOWER is featured at the front and center of this design. The large Japanese spring flower is joined by KENZO branding, decorating the casual jumper crafted from organic cotton-blend fabric.

Name: Patchwork Jumper
Description: Sporting a colorful patchwork finish, this jumper is crafted with various contrasting patterns and textures that all come together to create a retro-inspired piece of knitwear. Cut in an oversized, boxy fit with drop shoulders, orange ribbed detailing is used for the cuffs and neckline. This style is crafted entirely from GOTS (Global Organic Textile Standard) certified organic cotton, meaning that environmentally conscious practices such as water-saving farming methods and cultivation in an environment free of chemical fertilizers were used.

Name: Oversized Knit Gilet Orange
Description: Add a splash of color to your wardrobe with the Knit Gilet by Bonsai. Produced in 100% cotton, the sleeveless garment features intricate crochet knit construction creating a semi see-through look that caters to layering. A fun all-over pattern draws immediate attention to the piece, which is accentuated with chunky ribbed trims at the crew neck, cuffs, and hem. While fitting true to size, the gilet is cut for an oversized fit for a more comfortable wear.

Name: T-Urtle-G1 Top Yellow
Description: This new version of the T-Urtle-G1 is designed to inject color into your wardrobe. Made from a lightweight stretch jersey fabric, the vibrant yellow top features a super-slim fit that hugs the body for a form-fitting look. Branding is minimal by design, emerging by way of a metal D plaque on the arm, as the colorway alone is more than enough to capture attention.

Name: St. Moritz Cashmere Vest Blue
Description: The St. Moritz Vest once again finds Bally paying homage to one of the most iconic Swiss resorts. Produced in 100% cashmere, the comfy style is fit with rib knit trim at the neckline, cuffs, and hem, while being decorated with a cursive text logo on the front.

Name: Wool V-Neck Sweater Brown
Description: Made for everyone, the Wool V-Neck Sweater from Acne Studios is a versatile unisex style cut in a relaxed fit for an extra cozy wear. It is crafted from a super-soft wool and cashmere blend, featuring a rib knit V-neckline, cuffs, and hem, delivering a contemporary update to a classic garment.

Name: Elbow Patch Cardigan Beige
Description: A year-round layering gem, the Elbow Patch Cardigan by Maison Margiela is crafted from a soft wool blend. It features a low v-neck and contrasting button closure, in addition to traditional ribbed trims and tonal elbow patches. To subtly brand the design, the house’s trademark four stitches moniker is implemented on the back.

Name: Fuzzy Mohair Crewneck Sweater Multi
Description: AGR’s luxury knitwear is characterized by bold colors and high-quality materials. Styles like the Fuzzy Mohair Crewneck draw from the brand’s London roots and the city’s diverse culture, all while challenging traditional knitwear themes. Constructed from a fuzzy mohair and cotton blend, this comfy sweater is done up with a horizontal striped pattern with vibrant accenting colors that are sure to brighten up your wardrobe. The garment is cut in a regular fit and finished with ribbed trims.

Name: Clarinet Vest Pale Yellow/Brown
Description: The Clarinet Vest is a go-to layering piece from Wales Bonner’s latest seasonal collection. It is produced in a soft recycled cashmere and mohair blend, boasting contrasting knits and patterns in a 1970s-inspired colorway. The gender-neutral style is perfect for dressing up or down all year long.

Name: Swing Stripe Knit Vest Multi
Description: Wales Bonner’s Swing Vest is here to add a splash of color to your wardrobe. The comfy style is produced in a soft wool blend, showcasing a vibrant, multicolor stripe pattern in all-over fashion. A distinctive scooped neckline helps the piece stand out even further, as you can dress this one up or down, season after season.

Name: Merino Wool Crewneck Sweater Yellow
Description: This seasonal design by Acne Studios is produced in a soft merino wool and organic cotton blend for an extra cozy wear. It is cut in a relaxed fit to enhance comfort and offered in a deep yellow colorway that instantly brings a pop of color to your wardrobe. Dressed up or down, you’re sure to get plenty of use out of this monochromatic crewneck, which is primed and ready for year-round wear.

Name: Cashmere V-Neck Sweater Grey
Description: This lightweight knit style from Maison Margiela is constructed from organic cashmere, with seam details on the exterior. Cut in a regular fit, the super-soft sweater features ribbed trims and is minimally branded with the house’s iconic four stitches moniker at the back neck. It is perfect for multi-seasonal use, as you can wear it solo on breezy summer nights and layered with complementary pieces during the colder months.

Name: Jousting Thermal Navy
Description: The Jousting top blends elements from thermal and polo styles, boasting a waffle texture. Cut for a relaxed, boxy fit, the long-sleeve shirt is constructed from cotton jersey and detailed with a ribbed jersey insert at the neck. A faith star motif is embroidered onto the collar to serve as the lone branding hit.

Name: Wool Blend Jumper Camel Brown
Description: This Acne Studios jumper arrives for the season in a versatile camel brown colorway. Cut for a regular fit at hip length, the long-sleeve top is made from a rich wool and cotton blend fabric with a soft, slightly textured hand feel. It features traditional rib knit trims at the crew neck, cuffs, and hem.

Name: FZ Knit Sweater Stone Green
Description: The FZ Knit Sweater by Y-3 is a midweight outerwear style produced in a soft wool-polyester blend. It arrives in a seasonal Stone Green colorway, outfitted with a stand collar, two-way front zip closure, and thumbholes at the cuffs. Rib knit trims emerge at the collar, cuffs, and hem, as the style is then cut for a relaxed fit.

Name: Cashmere Crew Sweater Black
Description: The Cashmere Crew Sweater arrives cut in a relaxed fit, crafted entirely from lightweight cashmere that’s milled in Scotland. The long-sleeve top is finished through contrasting hues at the crewneck collar along with a ribbed hem and cuffs.

Name: Brushed Alpaca Cardigan Pale Rose
Description: The Brushed Alpaca Cardigan is crafted from midweight superfine alpaca known for its durability, warmth, and fluffy texture. The cozy cardigan arrives with smoked mother of pearl buttons along with ribbed trims at the collar and cuffs. This sweater is cut in a boxy fit and is minimally branded with a small Highsnobiety woven label along the hem.

Name: Merice Knit Camel
Description: The Merice Knit is a boucle knit wool-blend sweater, arriving this season in an inviting Camel colorway. It is cut in a relaxed fit for an extra comfortable wear and detailed with rib knit trims at the crew neck, cuffs, and hem.

Name: Striped Mohair Sweater Multi
Description: Marni’s Striped Mohair Sweater is sure to bring cozy vibes to your wardrobe this season and beyond. Predominantly produced in brushed mohair, the knit top showcases a multicolored striped pattern. It is cut in a relaxed fit for increased comfort and detailed with rib knit trims at the crew neck, cuffs, and hem.

Name: Hair Crewneck Sweater Pear Green
Description: ​​Acne Studios’ Hairy Crewneck Sweater is produced in a super-soft mohair and wool blend with a brushed texture that simply begs to be touched. The playful style is brought to life with an irregular, spotted pattern implemented in all-over fashion, one that is sure to catch the attention of passersby. Cut in a regular fit, the cozy sweater is detailed with ribbed trims, including the collar, cuffs, and hem, to complete the seasonal design.

Name: Vest Blue
Description: NY-based Noah and PUMA have teamed on a selection of court-ready styles for a tennis-themed capsule collection. This classic vest is crafted from recycled velour and arrives in a durable, midweight style with a ribbed v-neck collar. The duo finishes the vest with PUMA’s badge stitched along the chest and Noah’s logo embroidered at the rear.

Name: Wavy Stripe Wool Cardigan Midnight Blue
Description: A colorful piece of knitwear to arrive from Parisian luxury house KENZO, its red, purple, and black wavy stripe pattern takes inspiration from an ‘80s print. The bold, retro-infused style is accented through black buttons, a contrasting red pocket on the left chest, and a KENZO Paris label at back. This is all offered in a boxy cut that further updates the ‘80s-inspired design.

Name: High Neck Longsleeve Top Orange
Description: The dot print is a fixture in Jean Paul Gaultier’s retro-futuristic Cyber collection, which consists of polarizing ready-to-wear styles that point to the house’s iconic ‘90s archives. The High Neck Longsleeve is one of many pieces to showcase the pattern, coming together in a multicolor look. A tulle style, the top is made from lightweight and stretchy nylon fabric and features a turtleneck.

Name: Knit V-Neck Sweater Cedar
Description: Stockholm Surfboard Club’s V-Neck Sweater is a considerably comfy style produced in a loose cotton tuck knit. Offered in a deep orange colorway, the multi-seasonal piece is defined by cut-up detailing at the collar, featuring an oversized fit for an extra cozy wear.

Name: Super Hard Twist Rib Knit Cardigan Purple
Description: Made from high-quality cotton knitted slowly over time on a special knitting machine, this fluffy pullover is produced with coziness in mind. The soft and full fabric is utilized in an oversized fit with raglan sleeves for a comfort-oriented final piece. Japanese label Auralee has built a strong fan base for its attention to detail and premium fabrics, two qualities that elevate this particular garment.

Name: Crew Sweater Brown/Light Blue
Description: Featuring a loose gauge knit, the Highsnobiety Knit Crew Sweater brings a slightly sheer, semi see-through look to your wardrobe. The silhouette is cut in a loose, boxy fit with a ribbed crew neck, cuffs, and hem. Due to the fabric and construction method, we recommend folding the sweater as opposed to hanging it to preserve its shape.

Name: Naffs Cardigan
Description: Dries van Noten’s AW22 collection features a hybrid of unique prints, textures, and androgynous garments that offer a fresh take on contemporary menswear. The Naff Cardigan showcases the designer’s bold leopard-print design on this loose-fitted cardigan that adds a relaxed touch to any outfit. Crafted from a soft wool and cashmere blend, the cardigan is made with a classic v-neck collar,  two front patch pockets, and a ribbed hem.

Name: Striped V-Neck Sweater Vest Burnt Orange
Description: The resurgent sweater vest still deserves a proper place in any well-rounded wardrobe. This season, we’ve come through accordingly to deliver a playful new style executed in a thin alpaca blend. The vest is offered in bold color executions, featuring an all-over striped pattern, and detailed with ribbed trims. This essential Highsnobiety look is a modern take on a classic silhouette.

Name: Rib Knit Vest Orange
Description: Sweater vests are back in a major way. This warm weather season, we’re opting to wear ours with nothing underneath for a look that is equal parts playful and risky. The Rib Knit Vest from Jil Sander is produced in a plush wool and cotton blend that is considerably soft to the touch. The vibrant orange colorway allows it to be the focal point of your outfit, as you can pair it with shorts or pants and your favorite sandals.
